subject: Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The scandal broke in May 2006 when the sports physician Eufemiano Fuentes, the coach Manolo Saiz and six other people were arrested in Madrid on suspicion of providing doping services to cyclists.
